data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Harda, Madhya Pradesh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Harda, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help 114 new simple churches start among the 570,500 people in the county of Harda, Madhya Pradesh, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Harda, Madhya Pradesh, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Harda, Madhya Pradesh, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Tirmali people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Harda, Madhya Pradesh, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Harda, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.section_summary:
the county of Harda, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 570,500.

We estimate Harda has 6,276 people who might know Jesus, 6,922 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 557,302 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Harda.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.
